   <symbol id="clock" viewbox="0 0 14 14">
    <defs>
     <circle cx="6" cy="6.832" id="a" r="6">
     </circle>
    </defs>

     <mask fill="#fff" id="b">
      <use xlink:href="#a">
      </use>
     </mask>
     <circle cx="6" cy="6.832" r="6.5" stroke="#333">
     </circle>

     </path>
    </g>
   </symbol>

        <ul class="header-dropdown">
         <li class="header-dropdown__grid">
          <div class="header-dropdown__left-col">
           <a class="header-dropdown__heading" href="/oxfam-in-action/">
            Oxfam in Action
           </a>
           <p class="header-dropdown__sub-heading">
            We are a global movement of millions of people working together to end poverty.
           </p>
           <ul class="header-dropdown__list">
            <li>
             <a href="/oxfam-in-action/water-for-all/">
              Water
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/oxfam-in-action/women-equality/">
              Women's rights
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/oxfam-in-action/responding-coronavirus/">
              Fighting coronavirus
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/oxfam-in-action/tackling-climate-change/">
              Climate change
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/oxfam-in-action/beating-hunger/">
              Beating hunger
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/oxfam-in-action/health-and-education/">
              Health and Education
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/oxfam-in-action/impact-stories/">
              Impact stories
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/oxfam-in-action/current-emergencies/">
              Emergencies
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/oxfam-in-action/oxfam-blog/">
              Oxfam blog
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
           <div class="header-featured-grid">
            <a class="header-featured-item" href="/about-us/">
             <p class="t t--h3 header-featured-item__heading">
              About Oxfam
             </p>
             <div class="t t--meta header-featured-item__content">
              <p>
               Find out how we work in the UK and around the world.
              </p>
             </div>
            </a>
            <a class="header-featured-item" href="https://policy-practice.oxfam.org/">
             <p class="t t--h3 header-featured-item__heading">
              Policy &amp; Practice
             </p>
             <div class="t t--meta header-featured-item__content">
              <p>
               Cutting edge thinking, primary research, and practice built on years of experience.
              </p>
             </div>
            </a>
           </div>
          </div>
          <a class="header-cta" href="/donate/coronavirus-worldwide/">
           <p class="header-cta__label">
            Give now. Save lives.
           </p>
           <img alt="A woman wears a surgical mask and holds her baby in the Cox's Bazar refugee camp" height="235" src="https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/OGB_121383_Nurs__story__Coxs_Bazar.2e7ccd23.fill-500x235.jpg" width="500"/>
           <div class="header-cta__content">
            <p class="header-cta__content-heading">
             <span class="header-cta__heading">
              Coronavirus worldwide
             </span>
            </p>
            <p class="header-cta__summary">
             You can help protect the world's poorest people against coronavirus.
            </p>
            <div class="">
             <button class="button button--reversed header-cta__button">
              Donate now
             </button>
            </div>
           </div>
          </a>
         </li>
        </ul>
       </li>
       <li class="nav__item nav__item--primary nav__item--is-parent" data-desktop-nav-item="" role="presentation">
        <a aria-haspopup="true" class="nav__link" data-nav-link="" data-open-subnav="" href="/get-involved/" role="menuitem">

  <main class="main-content" data-page-overlay="" id="main-content">
   <div class="cta-with-image image-credit-container image-credit-container--grid cta-with-image--donate cta-with-image--as-hero">
    <button aria-label="See the credit for this image" class="button image-credit" data-image-credit="">
     <svg aria-hidden="true">
      <use xlink:href="#i-icon">
      </use>
     </svg>
    </button>
    <p class="image-credit-content" data-image-credit-window="">
     Shahida Akter Lucky stands in line with her child at a food distribution carried out by Oxfam partner Nari Maitree in Bangladesh. Photo: Fabeha Monir / Oxfam
    </p>
    <img alt="Shahida Akter Lucky stands in line with her child at a food distribution carried out by Oxfam partner Nari Maitree in Bangladesh. Photo: Fabeha Monir / Oxfam" class="cta-with-image__image" sizes="(max-width: 598px) 360px,
                (max-width: 1022px) and (min-width: 599px) 599px,
                (max-width: 1299px) and (min-width: 1023px) 1023px,
                (max-width: 1799px) and (min-width: 1300px) 1300px,
                (min-width: 1800px) 1800px" src="https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/covid_update_share.3bb6b9eb.fill-1800x600-c100.png" srcset="https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/covid_update_share.3bb6b9eb.fill-360x400-c100.png 360w,
                https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/covid_update_share.3bb6b9eb.fill-599x500-c100.png 599w,
                https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/covid_update_share.3bb6b9eb.fill-1023x600-c100.png 1023w,
                https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/covid_update_share.3bb6b9eb.fill-1300x600-c100.png 1300w,
                https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/covid_update_share.3bb6b9eb.fill-1800x600-c100.png 1800w,"/>
    <div class="cta-with-image__content-container">
     <a class="cta-with-image__content" href="https://www.oxfam.org.uk/donate/coronavirus-worldwide/">
      <h1 class="t t--large-teaser-heading">
       Give now. Save lives.
      </h1>
      <p class="t t--caption">
       While the world waits for the roll out of Covid-19 vaccines, our life-saving work must go on.
      </p>
      <div class="cta-with-image__button button button--reversed">
       Donate now
      </div>
      <span class="cta-with-image__meta t t--meta">
       Donations will be used to fund all our work, wherever the need is greatest.
      </span>
     </a>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="site-grid">
    <div class="site-grid__main">
     <div class="sf-block sf-block--full sf-block--flush">
      <div class="home-introduction">
       <h2 class="home-introduction__heading">
        We are Oxfam
       </h2>
       <h2 class="home-introduction__subheading">
        Let's beat poverty together
       </h2>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="sf-block sf-block--edges sf-block--flush">
      <div aria-label="Carousel slide" class="glide carousel carousel-home" data-home-carousel="" data-slidetotal="7">
       <div class="glide__track" data-glide-el="track">
        <ul aria-live="polite" class="glide__slides">
         <li class="glide__slide glide__slide--padded" data-carousel-item="">

             <h3 class="t t--h2 carousel-home-slide__title">

               <p>
                Scott in the UK
               </p>
              </div>
             </h3>
             <div class="carousel-home-slide__additional-content">
              <p>
               This store  it means the world to me.
              </p>

              </span>

            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
         </li>

      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="sf-block sf-block--full">
      <div class="oxfam-issues">
       <div class="rich-text">
        <h2>
        </h2>
        <p>
         Oxfam
         <b>
          in Action
         </b>
        </p>
       </div>
       <p class="oxfam-issues__summary">
        We are a global movement of millions of people working together to end poverty.
       </p>
       <ul class="oxfam-issues__list">
        <li>
         <h3>
          <a class="oxfam-issues__item" href="/oxfam-in-action/beating-hunger/">
           Beating hunger
          </a>
         </h3>
        </li>
        <li>
         <h3>
          <a class="oxfam-issues__item" href="/oxfam-in-action/responding-coronavirus/">
           Tackling coronavirus
          </a>
         </h3>
        </li>
        <li>
         <h3>
          <a class="oxfam-issues__item" href="/oxfam-in-action/water-for-all/">
           Safe, clean water for all
          </a>
         </h3>
        </li>
        <li>
         <h3>
          <a class="oxfam-issues__item" href="/oxfam-in-action/tackling-climate-change/">
           Fighting climate change
          </a>
         </h3>
        </li>
        <li>
         <h3>
          <a class="oxfam-issues__item" href="/oxfam-in-action/health-and-education/">
           Health and education
          </a>
         </h3>
        </li>
        <li>
         <h3>
          <a class="oxfam-issues__item" href="/oxfam-in-action/women-equality/">
           Women and gender justice
          </a>
         </h3>
        </li>
        <li>
         <h3>
          <a class="oxfam-issues__item" href="/oxfam-in-action/current-emergencies/">
           Responding in emergencies
          </a>
         </h3>
        </li>
        <li>
         <h3>
          <a class="oxfam-issues__item" href="/oxfam-in-action/impact-stories/">
           The impact of our work
          </a>
         </h3>
        </li>
       </ul>
       <a class="button button--primary oxfam-issues__button" href="/oxfam-in-action/">
        The issues we work on
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="sf-block sf-block--lead-right sf-block--flush">
      <div class="cta-with-image">
       <img alt="This Women's Group in Uganda make fuel briquettes out of crop waste. This helps provide an income and reduces the use of wood and charcoal. Photo: Elizabeth Stevens/Oxfam" class="cta-with-image__image" sizes="(max-width: 598px) 360px,
                (max-width: 1022px) and (min-width: 599px) 599px,
                (max-width: 1299px) and (min-width: 1023px) 1023px,
                (max-width: 1799px) and (min-width: 1300px) 1300px,
                (min-width: 1800px) 1800px" src="https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/homepageFebCash.23a7c2a8.fill-1800x600-c100.png" srcset="https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/homepageFebCash.23a7c2a8.fill-360x400-c100.png 360w,
                https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/homepageFebCash.23a7c2a8.fill-599x500-c100.png 599w,
                https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/homepageFebCash.23a7c2a8.fill-1023x600-c100.png 1023w,
                https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/homepageFebCash.23a7c2a8.fill-1300x600-c100.png 1300w,
                https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/homepageFebCash.23a7c2a8.fill-1800x600-c100.png 1800w,"/>
       <div class="cta-with-image__content-container">
        <a class="cta-with-image__content" href="/donate/people-powered-projects/">
         <h2 class="t t--large-teaser-heading">
          People-powered projects
         </h2>
         <p class="t t--caption">
          Your support could power a kinder, fairer climate-friendly future
         </p>
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="sf-block sf-block--full sf-block--flush">
      <div class="homepage-section-heading">
       <p class="t t--section-index-strapline-flush">
        Your support makes it possible
       </p>
       <h2 class="t t--h1 homepage-section-heading__subheading">
        Give your time, in your way
       </h2>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="sf-block sf-block--full">
      <div class="related-card-grid">
       <a class="related-card" href="https://www.oxfam.org.uk/shop-second-hand/">

    <div class="sf-block sf-block--full sf-block--bottom-space">
     <div class="sf-block sf-block--full sf-block--flush">
      <div class="homepage-section-heading">
       <h2 class="t t--h1 homepage-section-heading__subheading" data-hwsym-title="">
        For every 1 we spend
       </h2>
       <p class="t t--meta t--meta-slim">
        Excluding the costs of running our high street and online shops
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="tabs js-tabs">
      <div aria-label="Tabs" class="tab-list" role="tablist">
       <a aria-controls="hwsym-home-page-1" aria-selected="true" class="js-tab-item tab-list__item tab-list__item--green active" data-tab="hwsym-home-page-1" data-width="84" id="tab-home-page-1" role="tab" tabindex="0">
        <h3 class="tab-list__item-number">
         84
         <span>
          %
         </span>
        </h3>
        <p class="tab-list__item-summary">
         is spent fighting poverty
        </p>
       </a>
       <a aria-controls="hwsym-home-page-2" aria-selected="false" class="js-tab-item tab-list__item tab-list__item--blue" data-tab="hwsym-home-page-2" data-width="9" id="tab-home-page-2" role="tab" tabindex="0">
        <h3 class="tab-list__item-number">
         9
         <span>
          %
         </span>
        </h3>
        <p class="tab-list__item-summary">
         is spent on vital support costs
        </p>
       </a>
       <a aria-controls="hwsym-home-page-3" aria-selected="false" class="js-tab-item tab-list__item tab-list__item--orange" data-tab="hwsym-home-page-3" data-width="7" id="tab-home-page-3" role="tab" tabindex="0">
        <h3 class="tab-list__item-number">
         7
         <span>
          %
         </span>
        </h3>
        <p class="tab-list__item-summary">
         goes towards raising the next 1
        </p>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div>
       <div aria-labelledby="tab-home-page-1" class="js-tab-panel tab-panel tab-panel--green active" id="hwsym-home-page-1" role="tabpanel">
        <img alt="Birhan with her goats crossing lush grassland in Ethiopia" height="500" src="https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/OUS_54526__B7A4329-lpr.2e16d0ba.fill-800x500.jpg" width="800"/>
        <div class="tab-panel__content">
         <h4 class="tab-panel__heading">
          <span class="tab-panel__number">
           84%
          </span>
          goes directly to projects like these
         </h4>
         <p>
         </p>
         <a class="button button--secondary" href="/oxfam-in-action/impact-stories/">
          Our work together
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div aria-labelledby="tab-home-page-2" class="js-tab-panel tab-panel tab-panel--blue tab-panel--hidden" id="hwsym-home-page-2" role="tabpanel">
        <img alt="" height="500" src="https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/Oxfam-support.2e16d0ba.fill-800x500.png" width="800"/>
        <div class="tab-panel__content">
         <h4 class="tab-panel__heading">
          <span class="tab-panel__number">
           9%
          </span>
          goes towards vital support costs
         </h4>
         <p>
          Just 9p in every 1 is used to keep Oxfam alive; paying our staff and our running costs.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div aria-labelledby="tab-home-page-3" class="js-tab-panel tab-panel tab-panel--orange tab-panel--hidden" id="hwsym-home-page-3" role="tabpanel">
        <img alt="&lt;script&gt;alert(2)&lt;/script&gt;" height="500" src="https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/Oxfam-Glastonbury-1500x950.origina.2e16d0ba.fill-800x500.jpg" width="800"/>
        <div class="tab-panel__content">
         <h4 class="tab-panel__heading">
          <span class="tab-panel__number">
           7%
          </span>
          goes towards fundraising
         </h4>
         <p>
          For every 1 we spend, 7p is invested on generating future income, helping us to fund even more vital work.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="sf-block sf-block--lead-right">
     <div class="donate-block donate-block--sf donate-block--quote" style="background-image:url('https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/mosammatDonateWidget4.85a5cdcc.fill-1900x860.jpg')">
      <div class="image-credit-container image-credit-container--donate-block-top">
       <button aria-label="See the credit for this image" class="button image-credit" data-image-credit="">
        <svg aria-hidden="true">
         <use xlink:href="#i-icon">
         </use>
        </svg>
       </button>
       <p class="image-credit-content" data-image-credit-window="">
        Mosammat is president of a community food bank in Bangladesh, supported by an Oxfam local partner. Photo: Saikat Mojumder / Oxfam
       </p>
      </div>
      <img a="" alt="Mosammat" an="" bangladesh="" bank="" by="" class="donate-block__image donate-block__image--mobile" community="" food="" in="" is="" local="" of="" oxfam="" partner.="" president="" src="https://staticassets.oxfam.org.uk/oxfamgb-production/images/mosammatDonateWidget4.85a5cdcc.fill-600x440.jpg" supported=""/>
      <div class="site-grid">
       <div class="donate-block__content">
        <p class="donate-block__summary t t--h3">
         25 could help families facing hunger to get emergency food
        </p>
        <h2 class="donate-block__heading t t--h1">
         Will you fight hunger with Mosammat?
        </h2>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="site-grid">
       <div class="donate-block__widget">
        <div class="donate" data-action-url="/_donate/" data-allow-monthly-donations="" data-allow-single-donations="" data-campaign-id="222" data-crm-event-code="" data-default-frequency="single" data-donate-amount-and-frequency-chooser="" data-maximum-monthly-amount="" data-maximum-single-amount="" data-minimum-monthly-amount="1.00" data-minimum-single-amount="2.00" data-show-other-amount-option="" data-suggested-amounts-monthly="5,15,20" data-suggested-amounts-single="25,50,100">
        </div>
        <script src="/static/js/donationchooser.63f2297e834d.js" type="text/javascript">
        </script>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="donate-block__credit-container">
       <blockquote class="sf-quote sf-quote--donate">
        <p class="t t--quote sf-quote__content">
         I dont want to see the next generation suffering from floods, hunger, or lack of education.
        </p>
        <cite class="sf-quote__author">
         <div class="rich-text">
          <b>
           Mosammat
          </b>
          , food bank president, Bangladesh
         </div>
        </cite>
       </blockquote>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

.6 0 .8-.1.3-.1.5-.3.8-.6s.4-.7.4-1.2zm18.8 5H87l-4.2-9.9v9.9h-3.2V.8h3.3l4.3 10.1V.8h3.2v17.8zM100 0l-3.8 6.1h-2.1L96.3 0h3.7zm13.3 4h-4v14.6h-3.2V4h-4V.8h11.2V4zm20.1
